message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $100?

I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob, but I have to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $130 for the product. Can we discuss further?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to propose a price of $120 for the product. This is the highest I can go while still staying within my budget.
